welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sierra Madre, a charming city nestled in the foothills of the San Gabriel Mountains. Known for its picturesque views and rich history, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Whiteman Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Bob Hope Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest and most modern terminal at LAX, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving Southwest Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving Delta Air Lines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving Alaska Airlines, Horizon Air, and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving American Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving American Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving Alaska Airlines, Boutique Air, and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving United Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving United Airlines and some international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or payment for full access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters specifically to private jet owners and offers a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to airlines such as Southwest and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international and domestic flights and is home to airlines such as Delta and United.

wifi.note: The WiFi is free for all passengers and does not require a password.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including baggage claim, check-in counters, and a small selection of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Torrance Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport houses the airport's administrative offices and provides services for private and charter flights.

terminals.name: Atlantic Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The Atlantic Aviation Terminal at Santa Monica Airport provides services for private and charter flights, including fueling and ground handling.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport offers a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
